
```{r data}
bad_drivers <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/fivethirtyeight/data/master/bad-drivers/bad-drivers.csv")

covid19 <- read.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/nytimes/covid-19-data/master/us-states.csv")

census_pop_est_2018 <- read_csv("https://www.dropbox.com/s/6txwv3b4ng7pepe/us_census_2018_state_pop_est.csv?dl=1") %>% 
  separate(state, into = c("dot","state"), extra = "merge") %>% 
  select(-dot) %>% 
  mutate(state = str_to_lower(state))
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(openintro)
library(maps)
library(ggmap)
library(gplots)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(sf)
library(ggthemes)
```

```{r}
bad_drivers_lower <- bad_drivers %>% 
  mutate(state = str_to_lower(State))

car_covid_data <- covid19 %>% 
  filter(date == max(date)) %>% 
  mutate(state = str_to_lower(state)) %>% 
  left_join(census_pop_est_2018, 
            by = "state") %>% 
  left_join(bad_drivers_lower, 
            by = "state") %>% 
  select(!State & !date) %>% 
  na.omit()
  
car_covid_data
```
